  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    SOAPRetryableException, SOAPSenderException, SOAPServerException

    public class SOAPException
extends java.rmi.RemoteException
    A generic SOAP exception.

      • getOtherMessages

        public java.lang.String getOtherMessages()
        Other messages attached to this exception. This message may contain information related to other exceptions that occurred during a SOAP call, but not directly associated with this particular exception.
